radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in contour and echotexture. No concerning focal liver lesions identified. The spleen is top normal in size, measuring 14 cm, unchanged. The pancreas is unremarkable, with the body and tail largely obscured by overlying bowel gas. A large gallstone is seen within the gallbladder neck, measuring 2.3 cm. No gallbladder wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid. No intra or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilation. The common bile duct is 7 mm and is unchanged. A large cyst in the right kidney was incompletely evaluated.
